pages.text: I read an entry from that strange green book telling me to summon some apparition that the elves say represents the embodiment of nature, and that by slaying it, I will "prove myself". Supposedly, this will allow me to achieve the pinnacle of the botanical arts. But something about it makes me... hesitate. What if I don't want to fight?

Up til now, I've been quite satisfied with constructing ever-elaborate contraptions with flowers and red math dust, with not a thought in all the worlds about a trial by combat to further my studies. This sudden shift in tone feels wrong - I won't do this! I'll find a way to avoid this conflict if it's the last thing I do, the intended path of advancement be damned. And with the knowledge I've gained from my findings Deeper Down, I just might have a way....

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: The extreme energy of a moonstone core, tinted with hues of restoration, prosperity, and purity, drawn together with the essence of self-expression...
